transcript: one of the most common traits that people who are poor have is that it's always tomorrow and so they never talk about anything in terms of today it's about starting tomorrow the diet tomorrow the diet on Monday next year myone New Year's resolution it's always pushing off so rather than delaying gratification they delay pain if last week you were like I'm starting my diet this week then it is now this week and you've delayed the pain to today that means that the body you have right now is the result of the delayed pain that you are now forcing yourself to they're somehow surprised when the bill comes due that they pushed off from the past
